error.message: '/images/headerwrap_main' 경로에 대한 컨트롤러가 없거나 이 컨트롤러가 IController를 구현하지 않습니다.
error.detail: System.Web.HttpException (0x80004005): '/images/headerwrap_main' 경로에 대한 컨트롤러가 없거나 이 컨트롤러가 IController를 구현하지 않습니다. 위치: System.Web.Mvc.DefaultControllerFactory.GetControllerInstance(RequestContext requestContext, Type controllerType) 위치: System.Web.Mvc.DefaultControllerFactory.CreateController(RequestContext requestContext, String controllerName) 위치: Castle.Proxies.Invocations.IControllerFactory_CreateController.InvokeMethodOnTarget() 위치: Castle.DynamicProxy.AbstractInvocation.Proceed() 위치: Glimpse.Core.Extensibility.CastleInvocationToAlternateMethodContextAdapter.Proceed() 위치: Glimpse.Core.Extensions.AlternateMethodContextExtensions.TryProceedWithTimer(IAlternateMethodContext context, TimerResult& timerResult) 위치: Glimpse.Core.Extensibility.AlternateMethod.NewImplementation(IAlternateMethodContext context) 위치: Glimpse.Core.Extensibility.AlternateTypeToCastleInterceptorAdapter.Intercept(IInvocation invocation) 위치: Castle.DynamicProxy.AbstractInvocation.Proceed() 위치: Castle.Proxies.IControllerFactoryProxy.CreateController(RequestContext requestContext, String controllerName) 위치: System.Web.Mvc.MvcHandler.ProcessRequestInit(HttpContextBase httpContext, IController& controller, IControllerFactory& factory) 위치: System.Web.Mvc.MvcHandler.BeginProcessRequest(HttpContextBase httpContext, AsyncCallback callback, Object state) 위치: System.Web.Mvc.MvcHandler.BeginProcessRequest(HttpContext httpContext, AsyncCallback callback, Object state) 위치: System.Web.Mvc.MvcHandler.System.Web.IHttpAsyncHandler.BeginProcessRequest(HttpContext context, AsyncCallback cb, Object extraData) 위치: System.Web.HttpApplication.CallHandlerExecutionStep.System.Web.HttpApplication.IExecutionStep.Execute() 위치: System.Web.HttpApplication.ExecuteStep(IExecutionStep step, Boolean& completedSynchronously)
